listsManagementClasses

Class NamedDiskUnit

  • java.lang.Object
    • listsManagementClasses.NamedDiskUnit

  • public class NamedDiskUnit
extends java.lang.Object
    Represents a DiskUnit with a name.
    Author:
    Jose Antonio Rodriguez Rivera

    • Constructor Summary

      Creates a NamedDIskUnit with the given parameters.

      • formatDisk

        public void formatDisk(int numberOfBlocks,
                       int blockSize)
                throws NonExistingDiskException,
                       java.security.InvalidParameterException
        Formats the disk with the given parameters.
        Parameters:
        numberOfBlocks - the number of blocks the disk will have
        blockSize - the size of each block the disk will have
        Throws:
        NonExistingDiskException - if the disk does not exist
        java.security.InvalidParameterException - if the parameters are not powers of 2
